price: Ergaawwan Gooftaa isaanii dhugumatti bakkaan ga'uu isaanii’ akka ifa baasuuf (eegdota kaa'e) waan isaan bira jiru hundatti marsee waan hundaayyuu lakkoofsaan walitti qabe (beeke) ‘
arabic: لِّيَعۡلَمَ أَن قَدۡ أَبۡلَغُواْ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ وَأَحۡصَىٰ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ عَدَدَۢا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: liyaʿlama an qad ablaghū risālāti rabbihim wa-aḥāṭa bimā ladayhim wa-aḥṣā kulla shayin ʿadadan
